"Automata Swarm":
"Dude, I really hate those things! You know, those pesky
little automata? Gardeens or whatever they're called?
Those little cowards are weaklings on their own, but
when they swarm you in large numbers, they're a
major pain! I wish I could just take 'em out all at once,
but no, they have to go and call on their friends to
join in! Did I mention I really hate those things?
Oh, right, I did. Hey, would you mind taking them out
for me?
*Target: Hostiles level 21 or higher"

"いやちょっとマジふざけんなっての！
あのガーディンとか言う小型の機甲種！
一匹一匹弱ええくせに群れてやがるから
倒しにくいったらありゃしねえよ！
一気に倒せばいいんだろうけど、あいつら
仲間まで呼びやがるし……あー、うぜえ！
そもそも、ああいう小物倒すのって
オレの仕事じゃないしな。
おたく、さくさくっと倒してきてくんねえ？
※Lv.21～のエネミーが対象"
